action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hi, thanks for coming. Today is the big day, we finally test the time machine! I'm so excited. [E]"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "Hi, thanks for coming. Today is the big day, we finally test the time machine! I'm so excited. [E]"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "As you know, normally you would try to investigate the truth of a certain historical event in the period and location we've decided. [E]"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "As you know, normally you would try to investigate the truth of a certain historical event in the period and location we've decided. [E]"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "But today we just calibrate the machine! So, you will go to the 5th of June 8B50 and take a newspaper with you when you come back. [E]"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "But today we just calibrate the machine! So, you will go to the 5th of June 8B50 and take a newspaper with you when you come back. [E]"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Try to take some notes of events you encounter, like what was this up floor bar before it opens. [E]"

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "Try to take some notes of events you encounter, like what was this up floor bar before it opens. [E]"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "when you have finished the mission, join the extraction point. [E] "

condition.name: Compare text
condition.param: "when you have finished the mission, join the extraction point. [E] "

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Oh, I almost forgot to tell you, please don't modify the past, we're not sure of the consequences it can have."
